org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render
Class LineXYRenderer<T extends Tuple2D>

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render.DatasetRenderer<T>
      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render.LineXYRenderer<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
GssElement, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarChartXYRenderer
public class LineXYRenderer<T extends Tuple2D>
extends DatasetRenderer<T>
implements GssElement, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable

Renders scatter plot, lines, points+lines, or filled areas depending on GSS styling used.
